title: SET_PLAYER_WANTED_LEVEL
content:
0x39FF19C64EF7DA5B0xB7A0914B// SetPlayerWantedLevel
void SET_PLAYER_WANTED_LEVEL(Player player, int wantedLevel, BOOL delayedResponse);Parameters:player: the target playerwantedLevel: the wanted level 1-5delayedResponse: false = 0-10sec police spawn response time, true = 10-20sec police spawn response timeExamples:Lualocal player = PlayerId()
SetPlayerWantedLevel(player, 5, false) -- 5 star wanted level
codeBlocks:
// SetPlayerWantedLevel
void SET_PLAYER_WANTED_LEVEL(Player player, int wantedLevel, BOOL delayedResponse);

local player = PlayerId()
SetPlayerWantedLevel(player, 5, false) -- 5 star wanted level
